title: Oath, power to administer
context: §231-6 Oath, power to administer. The department of taxation may administer all oaths or affirmations required to be taken or be administered under chapters of the law under title 14 administered by the department, with respect to any matters coming within the scope of the duties of the department. [L 1932 2d, c 40, §10; RL 1935, §1916; RL 1945, §5110; RL 1955, §115-10; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §16; HRS §231-6; am L 1983, c 217, §4; am L 1985, c 16, §3; am L 1986, c 340, §3; am L 1991, c 263, §4; am L 1995, c 66, §4]
